intro.title: Event Introduction
intro.content:
GopherDay, a smaller event derived from GopherCon, is meticulously organized by the Golang Taiwan community. This event aims to bring together software professionals and enthusiasts who have a strong interest in the Golang programming language and related technologies. GopherDay provides an interactive and learning platform, allowing participants to delve into the latest developments, technological innovations, and best practices in Golang.

At GopherDay, we invite Golang users from various industries to share their knowledge and experiences. Whether you are a newcomer to Golang or a seasoned developer, you will find content that suits you here.

location.address:
Area A, 2F., No. 133, Sec. 4, Minsheng E. Rd.,
Songshan Dist., Taipei City

map.title: Traffic
map.bus_content: Take bus routes Brown 1, 12, 225, 248, 262, 262 Shuttle, 505, 518, 521, 612, 612 Shuttle, 63, 672, 905, 905 Sub, 254, or 652, and alight at Jieshou Junior High School Station. It's a one-minute walk across Guangfu North Road to reach the destination.
map.mrt_content: From the Wenhu Line, exit at Zhongshan Junior High School Station and take bus 225, 63, or Brown 1. Alternatively, exit at Songshan Airport Station and enter from Lane 107, Fujin Street. It's about a 10-minute walk to reach the destination.
map.car_content: There is a multi-level parking lot located behind the building. Access requires an EasyCard, and the rate is NT$30 per hour.
